attributes.action: New Prime Minister needs credentials that match and meet the next step of Brexit
attributes.background: Theresa May is stepping down and we need someone with actual credentials to lead the next step of Brexit. Not a politician, a teacher, a figure with no kudos to gain from the situation. An intelligent person who can provide good arguements towards issues and not take 1 political party's side.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. 

In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
